$comment: Base schema required for every package that is participating in Dock protocol

$schema.$comment: Key to identify dock-compatible schema that was used to build given data package

$originAddress.$comment: Ethereum address of the data creator. This should always remain the same for every package repackaging

$recipientAddress.$comment: Designated recipient address. This should always be changed on every package resending to match the recipient

$createdAt.$comment: Date when original package was created. This should remain unchanged during repackage.

$data.$comment: This is where package payload goes.
